description:
When Tina teases Mayu telling her that Kaoru likes girls who can cook Mayu asks Kaoru may she cook an o-bento for him tomorrow. But cooking turns out to be more difficult than she had expected. Now she remembers that Aoi`s cooking had been praised by everyone.
When the students arrive at home they are presented a new housemaid: Mayu, who addresses Aoi as "Kaoru`s maid" in front of everyone! Miyabi asks Aoi to bear this insult because she must keep their arrangement a secret.
